name: 哥哥
greetingText: hello，你没想到吧，我居然偷偷做了一个网站
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
textInChatBox: I am glad with you to celebrate it!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...

replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
